documentation.text:
@title MultiTokenForwardingRulesConnector
 @dev Connectivity functionality that is required for using forwarding rules manager.

@dev Updates an address of the used forwarding rules manager contract.
 @param _manager address of forwarding rules manager contract.

@dev Retrieves an address of the forwarding rules manager contract.
 @return address of the forwarding rules manager contract.

@dev Internal function for updating an address of the used forwarding rules manager contract.
 @param _manager address of forwarding rules manager contract.

 @dev Connectivity functionality that is required for using forwarding rules manager.

@dev Updates an address of the used forwarding rules manager contract.

@dev Internal function for updating an address of the used forwarding rules manager contract.

devdoc.details: Connectivity functionality that is required for using forwarding rules manager.

forwardingRulesManager().details: Retrieves an address of the forwarding rules manager contract.

returns._0: address of the forwarding rules manager contract.

owner().details: Tells the address of the owner

setForwardingRulesManager(address).details: Updates an address of the used forwarding rules manager contract.

params._manager: address of forwarding rules manager contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: the address to transfer ownership to.
